description.en: Perform puja to Shami tree. Arjuna and Pandavas had left their weapons on this tree during `ajJAtavAsa`. Those who are unable to worship the tree must at least chant the following shlokas.

shlokas:
zamIM zamayatE pApaM zamI zatruvinAzini.
arjunasya dhanurdhAtrI rAmasya priyadarzinI..

zamIM kamalapatrAkSIM zamIM kaNTakadhAriNIm.
ArOhatu zamIM lakSmIH nRNAmAyuSyavardhinIm..

namO vizvAsavRkSAya pArthazastrAstradhAriNE.
tvattaH patraM pratIcchAmi sadA vijayadO bhava..

amaGgalAnAM zamanIM duSkRtasya ca nAzinIm.
duHsvapnahAriNIM dhanyAM pravasyE'haM zamIM zubhAm..
